other_tests.findings: New atrial fibrillation with a rapid ventricular response.
other_tests.changes_over_time: ECG showed normal sinus rhythm with slightly prolonged QTc interval measuring 466 msec four weeks later.

other_tests.findings: Left atrial and left ventricular dilatation, low-normal left ventricular ejection fraction, mild left ventricular hypertrophy, no clinically significant valvular disease.
Average heart rate of 65 beats per minute, maximum heart rate of 84 beats per minute, no episodes of atrial fibrillation detected.
Atrial fibrillation with a rapid ventricular response and nonspecific ST-segment changes.
Average atrial heart rate of 368 beats per minute, average ventricular heart rate of 179 beats per minute during an episode of atrial fibrillation.
other_tests.changes_over_time: A reduction in frequency and duration of atrial fibrillation episodes was confirmed after the initiation of sotalol.
